definitions: To stand for or in place of; to act as a substitute or proxy for.
To symbolize or be a sign of.
To depict or portray in art or description.
To present an image or idea to the mind.
To make a statement or assertion, especially formally.
examples: The stars on the flag represent the states.
He was chosen to represent his country at the Olympics.
The artist tried to represent the beauty of nature.
This decision represents a major shift in policy.
The lawyer will represent her client in court.
